About Us

Millennium Glass are located on the Gold Coast in Burleigh Heads. We are dedicated to the best products with excellent service.

Your team of experts in Glass and Aluminium

Millennium Glass specialise in a range of glass splashbacks, shower screens, mirrors, sliding wardrobe doors, internal wardrobe shelving, glass pool fencing and balustrading for commercial, DIY and home renovators.

Daniel Trotman

Co-Founder & Owner

Daniel has extensive experience in all types of glass fitting, installation and manufacturing of various Glass and Aluminium products. Daniel works alongside a quality team of industry professionals. He is dedicated to providing high quality products with excellent, friendly customer service.

Quality

Premium and quality at competitive prices.

Old Fashioned Service

The best advice and education on Regulations and laws.

Fully Licensed

QBCC 1311306 and NSW fair work 286609C.

Dedicated

We are a small tight-knit team dedicated to supplying the best products.

Free Quotes

We offer free quotes and measurements and are particular with the quality of our installation.

High Standards

All products meet Australian standards.

Options

We value your time and money and will always provide the best options for your taste and finances.

10-Year Warranty

We provide 10-year work warranty.
